snippet: DeRozan, George, and Iguodala have all improved from beyond the arc this season.
abstract: DeRozan, George, and Iguodala have all improved from beyond the arc this season.
lead_paragraph: The addition of a consistent 3-point shot is one of the great off-season glamor moves in the world of N.B.A. player development, akin to adding "15 pounds of muscle," or a non-point guard claiming to have put in work on his ball-handling. But there's good reason for teams and players to value the extension of range back to the 3-point arc; although the long ball is certainly chic, it's also an incredibly efficient shot and a facilitator for an established halfcourt offense.
